p: Until today, the most advantageous therapies for the management of inflammatory state is based on the use of NSAIDs. Unfortunately, the chronic use of NSAIDs is connected with a broad spectrum of side effects ranging from gastrointestinal problems to kidney toxicity [ 64]. Toxicity and reappearance of signs is a major problem related to currently available synthetic drugs [ 64]. For these reasons the development of safer anti-inflammatory agents remains to be a subject of great interest [ 16]. Improvement of anti-inflammatory drugs derived from natural sources is the rational and productive strategy toward the cure of inflammatory ailments [ 72, 73].
